func.title: SetCrewStatus

param.name: player
param.desc: Player number of the player whose crew you want to change.

param.name: into_crew
param.desc: true if you want to add a clonk to the crew and false if you want to remove him.

func.desc: Adds or removes an object (usually a clonk) to or from the crew of a player. The object must have the CrewMember property set in the DefCore. This does not add the object to the permanent crew of the player, use MakeCrewMember for that.

example.text: This script creates a new clonk and adds it to the crew list of the owner.
